citations.narrative:
**During a review of facility records, it was noted that the fiscal year 2024 annual report had not been submitted. The last
annual report was submitted on 11/28/2023. The annual report submitted by the facility is a record of live animals used for
research, tests, teaching or experiments during the previous Federal fiscal year. It is the responsibility of the IACUC to
ensure the facility has submitted the annual report documenting the use of live animals in the previous Federal fiscal year
as set forth in this section.
**Correct by December 31, 2024
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
**During a review of facility records, it was noted that the fiscal year 2024 annual report had not been submitted. The last 
annual report was submitted on 11/28/2023. The annual report submitted by the facility is a record of live animals used for 
research, tests, teaching or experiments during the previous Federal fiscal year. It is the responsibility of the IACUC to 
ensure the facility has submitted the annual report documenting the use of live animals in the previous Federal fiscal year 
as set forth in this section. 
 
**Correct by December 31, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with facility representatives.
